abstract: The Marco Island Marriott Beach Resort in Florida adds flash mob services to its amenities list.
snippet: The Marco Island Marriott Beach Resort in Florida adds flash mob services to its amenities list.
lead_paragraph: Flash mobs - brief group assemblies usually for some whimsical purpose like dancing or pillow fighting - go commercial at the Marco Island Marriott Beach Resort near Naples, Fla. The hotel will assemble your very own flash mob to energize a sales convention or punctuate an engagement proposal.

headline.main: Beyond Room Service: Flash Mobs Available Upon Request
